title: You’ve made your legal declaration
paragraph1: When everyone has made their legal declaration, {leadExecFullName} will be asked to send all the relevant documents to the probate registry.
paragraph2: {leadExecFullName} will receive the grant of probate within 20 working days of the probate registry receiving all the necessary paperwork.
paragraph3: Contact {leadExecFullName} if you need more information.
paragraph4: You need to sign a photocopy of the will in the top right hand corner and send it to {leadExecFullName}.
paragraph4-codicils: You need to sign a photocopy of the will and any codicils in the top right hand corner and send it to {leadExecFullName}.
paragraph5b: your feedback will help us to improve it.
